Name: Only Entities
Description: Only import the entities from the VMF. Brushes and internal entities are not modified. Conserves existing lighting data.

Name: Only Props
Description: Only update static and detail props (i.e. the internal entities).
Warning: Does not generate a .prt file, making VVIS fail!

Name: Leak Test
Description: Stop compiling if a leak is detected.

Name: All Detail
Description: Make all geometry func_detail to improve VVIS times. Use with a radius override of 2500 in VVIS.
Warning: Support varies between versions of source.

Name: Verbose
Description: Turn on verbose output for debug purposes.
